job_title: Community Mental Health Counsellor in Mississauga, ON
pros: The ethical framework and Anti-Oppressive Perspective (AOP) along with SHIP's mission is practical for employees to apply on their work and with clients. The organization also provides the means for employees to find room for growth.
cons: There should be a wider diversity of employees, as SHIP is serving a highly diverse population in Peel Region.

pros: SHIP is a great company to work for- although there is plenty of work to be done, i truly believe that if you are passionate about mental health and housing, then this is the Organization to work for. Pay is definitely much better then most non profits and so are the benefits including RRSP.
cons: can't think of any right now.

job_title: Community Mental Health Counsellor in Mississauga, ON
pros: Caring Staff, and generally good team work
cons: Stressful work, not much chance to connect with team members

pros: They add names to Sunshine list (some of the worst humans I've encountered), if you are working as the CEO or incompetent management
cons: You work for a company that uses obsolete technology with bed bugs by your personal belongings. You might get a window AC or plug in fan blowing on you while those in crisis come into your office with no escape point. Health and safety laws ignored and the Union is deep in the pocket of this company that has led to a deepening crisis in the Peel community dating back to its foundation. I think the entire contract you sign is a con, or heaven forbid, a contract to utilize services.

review_title: Region of Peel deserves better with use of its resources
pros:
Work with a diverse range of populations.
Some staff are willing to relocate.
cons:
Poor attitude from manangment.
Culture entails follow direction and don't ask questions.
Veteran staff have been laid off without protocol being honoured in the collective agreement. 
A lot of complaining from those with more tenure about the management and vision of the organization .
Fail to promote from within.
